kpi_info.title: CELL SPECIFIC CPICH EC/NO - CLASS 1
kpi_info.use: Number of received 1A intra-frequency measurement reports in which the CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 1 range. The CPICH Ec/No measuring is done only for the best cell in the active set, i.e. the cell in the AS with the highest Ec/No value. UPDATED:When the UE sends the 1A event triggered intra-frequency measurement report to the RNC in the RRC: MEASUREMENT REPORT message and the reported CPICH Ec/No value is inside Class 1 range (29<=EcNo<39), corresponding to (-10dB<=EcIo<-5dB) in power values.
